predicate.note: Frames file for 'defuse' based on sentences in wsj. No Verbnet entry.

example.name: straight transitive
example.text: Lawyers for dozens of insolvent savings and loan associations are trying a new tack in their efforts *trace* to defuse suits filed by borrowers, developers and creditors.
example.arg: *trace* -> Lawyers for dozens of insolvent savings and loan associations
suits filed by borrowers, developers and creditors

example.name: with manner adverbial
example.text: Earlier this week, Dr. Sullivan tried *trace* to defuse these charges by stressing that candidates to head the NIH and the CDC will be judged by ``standards of scientific and administrative excellence,'' not politics.
example.arg: by stressing that candidates to head the NIH and the CDC will be judged by ``standards of scientific and administrative excellence,'' not politics
